alert.note: Alert for Florence; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 7:09PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Florence and northwestern Marion Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 708 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Claussen, or 10 miles southeast of Florence, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marion, Blue Brick, Zion, Mars Bluff, Claussen, Francis Marion University, Evergreen, Rains and Carolinas Hospital System - Marion. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
